results.title: Mississippi masala [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Mira Nair, Michael Nozik, Film Four International and SCS Films
results.brief_description: A refreshingly tender film about race relations in the United States that manages to be both intelligent and complex. Mina (Roshan Seth) is an Indian woman whose family fled Uganda during the rule of Idi Amin. She falls in love with Demetrius (Denzel Washington), an African-American who is challenged by the traditions of her Indian background. She in turn has to fight against her family’s fears and racism. Without histrionics this film paints a picture of small-town Americana that is rich and diverse. A wonderful comic love story with excellent performances.

results.title: Mississippi burning
results.creator_credit: Allan Parker, Robert F. Colesberry, Frederick Zollo, Rank Film Productions and Orion Pictures Corporation
results.brief_description: Gene Hackman and Willem Dafoe star as two FBI agents investigating the murder of three Civil Rights activists in a small Mississippi town in the early 1960’s. Parker drew on a real event for inspiration and this acclaimed film is tension filled. The violence and hatred which erupts from racial intolerance is a strong focus and is all the more shocking because it is endorsed and perpertrated by those representing the law. The excellent cast features Frances McDormand as the wife of the corrupt Deputy Sherriff, Stephen Toblowsky as head Klansman Townley and Michael Rooker who gives a chilling performance as the violent Klansman Frank. A strong point of the film’s script is the developing relationship between the two FBI men who come from different backgrounds with conflicting ideas. Their relationship evolves from mutual distrust to one of respect, and ultimately their combined forces enable them to reveal the truth about the murders.

results.title: Mission: impossible 2
results.creator_credit: John Woo, Paula Wagner, Tom Cruise, Wagner Production and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Visually charged action-packed sequel to the 1996 original, “Mission Impossible 2”, directed by John Woo, has all the kinetic thrills expected from a master of the genre, but a simplified script leaves it strangely lacking in tension. Tom Cruise reprises his role as Ethan Hunt, the daredevil spy, who falls for a former flame of a spy turned bad. Hunt must rescue his new love, and save the world from a deadly virus. Supporting cast includes Thandie Newton (as the love interest) and Dougray Scott (as the villain).

results.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Bad Robot, Skydance Media, TC Productions, Alibaba Pictures Group, Christopher McQuarrie, Bruce Geller, Tom Cruise, J.J. Abrams, Peter Wenham, Dana Goldberg, Jake Myers, Bryan Burk, Don Granger, David Ellison and Raphaël Benoliel
results.headline_credit: China, France, Norway and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: When an IMF mission ends badly, the world is faced with dire consequences. As Ethan Hunt takes it upon himself to fulfill his original briefing, the CIA begin to question his loyalty and his motives. The IMF team find themselves in a race against time, hunted by assassins while trying to prevent a global catastrophe.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.title: Mission: Impossible
results.creator_credit: Barry Crane, Robert H. Justman, Allan Balter, William Woodfield, Joseph Gantman, Desilu Productions and Paramount Television
results.brief_description: Mission: Impossible is an American television series that was created and initially produced by Bruce Geller. It chronicles the missions of a team of secret government agents known as the Impossible Missions Force.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Barry Crane, Robert H. Justman, Allan Balter, William Woodfield, Joseph Gantman, Desilu Productions and Paramount Television
results.description:
Mission: Impossible is an American television series that was created and initially produced by Bruce Geller. It chronicles the missions of a team of secret government agents known as the Impossible Missions Force. In the first season, the team is led by Dan Briggs, played by Steven Hill; Jim Phelps, played by Peter Graves, takes charge for the remaining seasons. A hallmark of the series shows Briggs or Phelps receiving his instructions on a recording that then self-destructs, followed by the theme music composed by Lalo Schifrin.

The series aired on the CBS network from September 1966 to March 1973, then returned to television for two seasons on ABC, from 1988 to 1990, retaining only Graves in the cast. It later inspired a popular series of theatrical motion pictures starring Tom Cruise, beginning in 1996.
description_for_label:
Mission: Impossible is an American television series that was created and initially produced by Bruce Geller. It chronicles the missions of a team of secret government agents known as the Impossible Missions Force. In the first season, the team is led by Dan Briggs, played by Steven Hill; Jim Phelps, played by Peter Graves, takes charge for the remaining seasons. A hallmark of the series shows Briggs or Phelps receiving his instructions on a recording that then self-destructs, followed by the theme music composed by Lalo Schifrin.

The series aired on the CBS network from September 1966 to March 1973, then returned to television for two seasons on ABC, from 1988 to 1990, retaining only Graves in the cast. It later inspired a popular series of theatrical motion pictures starring Tom Cruise, beginning in 1996.

results.title: Mission: impossible
results.creator_credit: Brian De Palma, Cruise/Wagner and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Tom Cruise stars in this high action remake of the television series. The film is an action packed, gadget filled blockbuster with twisting plots, glamour and double crossing secret agents. “Mission: Impossible” is a big-production exciting spy thriller. Cast includes Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Beart, Henry Czerny, Jean Reno, Kristin Scott-Thomas and Vanessa Redgrave.

results.title: Mission: Australia (PC & MAC)
results.creator_credit: Mission Australia Consortium and Garner MacLennan Interactive
results.brief_description: What kind of place will Australia be in the future? Join Aunty M the River Red Gum and a whole host of fascinating characters on an interactive mission to maintain some of Australia’s uniquely beautiful environments and preserve its distinctive flora and fauna. Enter the simulator and journey to the coast, an estuary, an arid rangeland, or even the city where you will encounter environmental problems, and be offered a wide range of suggestions to solve them, but keep in mind every action wins a score. Some solutions might not rate in terms of human prosperity, but will drastically improve the environment. Alternatively, some solutions will benefit humans, but impact negatively on our surroundings. Your mission is to find a logical balance between profit and preservation before it’s too late. Beautiful graphics, easy to install and very user-friendly. Teacher’s notes and class activity sheets can be downloaded from the CD. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: For Windows, 486 DX2/66 or better (Pentium recommended) running Windows 95/Windows 3.1, 16 megabytes or more of RAM. Double speed or faster CD-ROM drive (Quad speed recommended). Sound card (stereo 16-bit recommened), and 640X480 Super VGA display (256 colour or better). For Macintosh, 68040 or better (Power PC recommended) running Mac OS System 7.5 or later, 8 megabytes of free RAM. Double-speed or faster CD-ROM drive (Quad speed recommended), 640X480 display (256 colour or better).

results.title: Mission to Yenan
results.creator_credit: Peter F. Davis, Joe de Cola and Films Incorporated
results.brief_description: Relates the experiences of four former United States Foreign Service China specialists who foresaw the defeat of Chiang Kai-Shek and recommended, at end of World War II, that the United States adopt a more open-ended policy towards Communist China. Their advice was not headed then and they discuss their views in light of subsequent events in Asia.

results.title: Mission to no man's land
results.creator_credit: Georges Pessis, Stanley Wright, Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and Rank Screen Services
results.brief_description: A tour of a typical Austrian refugee camp, showing something of the extent of the problem. Yul Brynner records interviews with the refugees. One particularly moving sequence shows an elderly refugee talking on the long distance telephone with his family in the United States.
